rows.label: tev000101_MSG0001
rows.name:
As you explore the administrative district, think about
what sort of life you'd like to lead here in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Take all the time you need.
I'll be right here whenever you're ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG0007
rows.name:
Installing data probes is one of BLADE's most
fundamental duties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG0008
rows.name:
But that's a lesson that's perhaps best taught in the
field. I'd like you to accompany Elma to see exactly
what I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG0009
rows.name:
This'll be your first BLADE mission. You can expect to
be compensated if it's completed to our satisfaction.
Now show us what you can do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1001
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ]!
Just the BLADE I've been looking for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1002
rows.name:
I've been thinking I'd like to join your team.
You know, get out there and experience the daily grind
of a BLADE operative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1003
rows.name:
Sitting behind a desk all day dulls a person's senses,
and I can't afford to let those—or my combat skills—
fall into disarray. So what do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: tev000101_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Nagi to your team.

rows.label: tev000101_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000101_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Nagi's request for now.

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1004
rows.name:
Excellent. Then from this point forth, I'll be an acting
member of your team. Command me as you see fit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1005
rows.name:
Is that so? Well, I'm sorry to hear that. If you change
your mind later, my request still stands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1010
rows.name:
There is still so much we don't fully understand,
but nonetheless, the Ganglion are defeated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1011
rows.name:
And as secretary of defense, that has lightened my
workload significantly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1012
rows.name:
Which means I'm now free to tromp about Mira just
like any other BLADE operative![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1013
rows.name:
If you have an opening on your team,
I'd be grateful for the chance to fill it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_JNK0170
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: tev000101_SEL0171
rows.name: Add Nagi to your team.

rows.label: tev000101_JNK0180
rows.name: Reject

rows.label: tev000101_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline Nagi's request for now.

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1015
rows.name:
Is that so? Well, I'm sorry to hear that. If you change
your mind later, my request still stands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1018
rows.name:
Good to see you're back safe and sound. Please report
to Director General Chausson immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1019
rows.name:
I must refrain from participating in team activities until
you've issued your report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1020
rows.name:
Unfortunately, the director general and I have some
important matters to discuss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000101_MSG1021
rows.name:
I'm confident you'll be able to complete your missions
without me.[ST:wait ]
